title: Australian diary. No. 062
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Sub-titled “The Flying Doctor”; an insight into the work of the Flying Doctor Service in Broken Hill providing a medical service for the pioneers and settlers opening up the vast stretches of sheep and cattle country in the Australian inland such as Tibooburra Station.
